comments.body: I support this idea! I also think this should be in Java! Because, in java armor stand don't even have arms! Adding this would be so much easier than just using commands! Nice Post!

I think it should contain copper in craft, because copper is useless except lightning bolt, spyglass and decor

I lost days worth of work because of this and never got to show it to anyone im crying and don't even want to play now. A whole Halloween adventure made for my niece gone. Key locks baby zombies trapped spiders trapped about 2 shulkers of deepslate mined and placed at least 3 times that in Blackstone. Netherite gear gone. A dripstone cavern I mean the list goes on. I thought this problem would have been solved by now been playing pocket edition since about 2014 I think. Play mainly on pc but monitor was down and I have a realm that I had just saved to pocket before it went down. So I'd forgotten all about this issue. Just can't believe its been so long and they haven't fixed this. With a permission to access files on phone this could be fixed.... its so simple please pay attention to this thread.

Hello, this appears to be a non-English post. Below you will find a transcription of the topic being discussed.  

Title: â€œBlaze rods immune to fireâ€  

Text: â€œIt would be great and it would make a lot of sense that the blaze rods will not burn with fire or lava since it is a part of the body of the blaze and the blaze is completely immune to these things would also facilitate a little the farms of blaze pushing the blaze did in place of slaughter with the lava without being afraid to lose the rodsâ€

Cool idea, I just realized that if it is the same block slab, it can create one full block, but if it is two different slabs, then it levitates on top of each other. I love this.
That wouldne revolutionairy for the building community.
This issue is tracked on the bug tracker here: https://bugs.mojang.com/browse/MCPE-123245
